name: Markbruns.GitHub.io
tagline: Notes from the underbelly of reliability engineering
body:
### OpenSoucist
Instead of zookeeper, what if the world were made up of simple, symmetric, independent NODES.
```
What if open source was not just a way of thinking about software, what we thought about human beings as if they were SUPPOSED to be independent

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
